#READ IN PACKAGES
```{r packages}
if (!require("dplyr")) install.packages("dplyr",dependencies = T)

library(dplyr)
```

#READ IN SONG DATASET
```{r read data}
songs_raw = read.csv('sonestak.csv',header=F,stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(songs_raw) = c('Artist','Album','Track','Timestamp')
```
